m_szDocSumamry: Casualty Actuarial Society E-Forum, Summer 2015 1 Insurance 2.0: Insuring the Sharing Economy & Sharing the Insurance Economy Dion Oryzak and Amit Verma ____________________________________________________________________________________________ Abstract: The rise of the sharing economy (including firms such as Uber, Airbnb and TaskRabbit) has created new insurance challenges as assets traditionally insured under personal lines policies are being used by micropreneurs to generate income on a part-time, and often full-time, basis. The peer-to-peer nature of these unique risks is unprecedented a
